subject: RE: [junit] Loading a DLL
msgSnippet: Hi, ... AFAIR this property is only evaluated once at JVM startup, your modification is not picked up by the JVM. You must use command line options to set this
messageBody:
Hi,

> String initialPath = System.getProperty("java.library.path");
> System.setProperty(
> "java.library.path", "C:\\programs\\bea81\\weblogic81
> \\server\\bin;" + initialPath);
> But this doesn't seem to make any difference.

AFAIR this property is only evaluated once at JVM startup, your modification
is not
picked up by the JVM. You must use command line options to set this
property.

Bernd
